title: Certified copies (birth certificates, passports, diplomas)
personalDataVerified: Document holder name, original document details, notary certification statement, copy date, notary name, notary commission number, notary seal
personalDataVisible: Notary commission status (active/expired/revoked). Link to state notary database (immigration officials and employers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake certified copies for immigration and employment verification. Domain binding verifies notary commission. Immigration applications (USCIS) require certified passport copies. School enrollment requires certified diploma copies. Employment verification uses certified credentials. Prevents document fraud in critical applications. Notaries certify copies match originals without revealing full original documents.
